description:
Fat bike riders, packing your gear just got easier. Whether you are looking to take a larger tent on your next bikepacking trip, or thermos of cocoa while exploring snowy trails, the Spider Fat Rack gives you options. The versatile design uses 2 composite mounting brackets that attach to your bike’s seatstays via nylon straps. It works on nearly any fat bike, including e-bikes and full suspension, big tires and a moving rear triangle are not an issue. The upper cradle is made for a small dry bag or sleeping bag stuff sack. The platform can be rotated or even mounted on the side, so you can customize your rack to your gear, or your bike (think dropper post).

  • Fits tires up to 5 inches
  • Seatstay mount design doesn’t need any hardware or frame mounting points
  • Touchpoints are protected with a silicone coating
  • Integrated straps secure your cargo and have a clean, svelte look
  • Upper cradle can be mounted inline with the frame or rotated up to 90° (with a 5mm Allen key)
  • Included cradle can be mounted on the top (as it ships) or on the sides, depending on your loadout
  • Stable design means zero sway
  • More cradles and weatherproof pods available separately
name: Aeroe Spider Fat Rack
